name: pricelessly
content:
pricelessly adverb
(FUNNY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely funny to see or hear : pricelessly funny The two actors make a pricelessly funny pair of brothers in this brilliant comedy. Leaving the role for health reasons, she declared, pricelessly, that the CEO "makes me sick".
More examplesFewer examplesThe duke's memoir is a pricelessly entertaining chronicle of lies, lust, and loathing behind the tapestries at Versailles.The little comments that accompany the recipes are pricelessly cute.As one clothes designer pricelessly put it: "suddenly hairdressers were vitally important."

pricelessly adverb
(VALUABLE)
in a way that has a high value, especially because it is so rare or special that the price of it cannot be calculated: The manuscripts and journals in his collection were all pricelessly rare. The house had some beautiful features, and, pricelessly, an annexe where my mother could live.
